coway_api_deprecation.title: Coway API Deprecation
coway_api_deprecation.description: The API used by the Coway IoCare app, as well as this integration, will be shut down on September 1st, 2025. Coway is switching over to their new IoCare+ app. As a result, I have to reverse engineer the new API and rewrite the integration. While you can register your purifier(s) in the new app, please don't remove it/them from the old IoCare app - doing so, before I have incorporated the new API into this integration, will result in the inability of the integration to find any purifiers. For more info about Coway's API deprecation visit https://iocare.coway.com/notice/20250626/notice_250626.html
